column4: I want to uninstall vim-tiny and install a full version of vim on Ubuntu 8.10, but when I use Synaptic to try and remove vim-tiny and vim-common (the only two packages with vim in their name that are currently installed), it also requires me to uninstall ubuntu-minimal.  Is that safe?
just apt-get install vim-full, and it will ask you if you want to fix that issue when you install it.
Okay, I'll give that a shot
